thread.title: LME agreement to increase China’s global commodities market access
thread.title_full: LME agreement to increase China’s global commodities market access

author: Financial News
title: LME agreement to increase China’s global commodities market access
text:
LME agreement to increase China’s global commodities market access By Chiara Albanese, WSJ 22 October 2015 The London Metal Exchange said on October 21 that it has signed an agreement with six Chinese and UK banks to increase the access of Chinese institutions to global commodities markets, in another step in UK efforts to make London the major global offshore trading hub for China’s currency, the yuan.
